deal.firstPara: We know how tempting it can be to quickly reach for that packet of crisps or grab a bar of chocolate from your kitchen cupboard.
deal.secondPara: That’s where we can help - each of our tasty snacks are made with ingredients from nature and are packed with benefits, like protein, fibre or vitamins & minerals, which makes them the perfect feel-good switch!
deal.thirdPara: And to make this month a little sweeter (or crunchier, or oatier, or nuttier, or…) we’re offering a 20% off* graze shop!

rewards.title: Fancy a different offer? Check out your rewards
